title: Sensor Stream
description: Sensor Stream allows you to stream sensor data of pc components like gpu, cpu, ram, storage, etc, through UDP datagrams or WebSockets

title: My System Information
description: My System Information (msi) allows you to visualize the main components of your Windows computer

description: Visualize real-time graphs such as temperatures and loads of your PC components

title: osu! koko
description: Automatic music downloader extension for osu! game

title: Décimo Panamá
description: Pequeña herramienta para calcular el décimo en Panamá

title: hexyjs
description: A simple Javascript library with some hexadecimal utilities

title: shothash2
description: A mini js lib to generate short, alpha-number, undecryptable and unique hash id from a long string (utf8 format)

title: Platzinger
description: [Sandbox] Example of a realtime messaging SPA in Angular 7 and Firebase
